ClaimCovReserveAdjustment.name: ClaimCovReserveAdjustment
ClaimCovReserveAdjustment.description: Represents the amount adjusted on a claim coverage reserve as the reserve is changed and payments are made.

AdjustmentAmount.description: The amount after adjustments are made in account for deductibles, copay, or coinsurance.

AdjustmentReason.description: The reason for the claim coverage reserve adjustment.

ClaimCoverageId.description: The Claim Coverage associated with the Claim Coverage Reserve Adjustment.

ClaimCoverageReserveDetailId.description: The Claim Coverage Reserve Detail associated with the Claim Coverage Reserve Adjustment.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage reserve adjustment.
